name: Car Challenge: Dangerous Stunt
description:
Car Challenge: Dangerous Stunts is actually a high speed race,which eventually turns into city race and highway race.You can enjoy different kind of racing like city race,high speed race and highway race actually availability of all these race make it top car racing games 3d of all the time.The wild and crazy fantasy stunts city will blow your mind! venom stunt environment,awesome car smashing machines and mechanized techno based obstacles.
FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Difficult Obstacles
- Narrow and ramp roads which looks impossible to drive
- Detailed environment
- Immersive and addicting driving,sharp narrow turns
- Different new cars to choose from!
